item.description:
Hi,

Sorry for last minute change but I just found out yesterday there will be ASL tour at MFA on Wednesday, March 13, 2013.

Tour guide is Leon Jerfita. Tour will begin at 6:00 pm but please meet the group at Sharf Visitor Center at 5:50 pm. I believe tour will last 45 minutes to one hour. Then we can wander into museum until it closes at 9:45 pm.

T stop is Museum of Fine Art on Green Line.

Looking forward to see all of you there.

ASL meetup will resume next week.

Best,

Sean
item.how_to_find_us: Look for people signing in Sharf Visitor Center
item.name: ASL tour at Museum of Fine Arts
